mapper.insert: insert into app_member(name, email, pwd, tel) values(#{name}, #{email}, sha2(#{password},256), #{tel})
mapper.select: select member_id as no, name, email, created_date as createdDate from app_member order by member_id desc
select member_id as no, name, email, tel, created_date as createdDate from app_member where member_id=#{no}
